title: Nice N Natural
description: Opened since 1987. Has a juice bar, wheat grass shots and also makes smoothies. Sells baked goods, some are vegan, freshly in-house-made lunch items, snacks, vitamin supplements, and more. Uses no artificial sweeteners, preservatives, or pre-mixes to juices or smoothies and serves them in bio-degradable cups. Prepares vegan food items using fresh ingredients.
